Courses.title: Complete Web Development Certificate Course
Courses.summary: This is an introductory course that teaches the basics of Web Development. I had my first hand experience with web development following this course in 2020

Courses.title: Become A Software Developer
Courses.summary: I have an hands-on introduction to various aspects of software Development. Built my first ever project which is a simple portfolio.

Courses.title: Google Africa Developers Scholarship Program
Courses.summary: Learning with others really makes the program fun and interesting. I learn how to build a front-end web application through this course.

Courses.title: Javascript Data Structures and Algorithms
Courses.summary: The most complete Javascript Course I have ever taken. I learn what the language entails from a Beginner to Expert
